video_title: Will AI Agents Use Crypto? Bridging AI and Decentralized Economies - SuperAI Singapore 2025
description:
Learn more about SuperAI: superai.com
Follow us on X: x.com/superai_conf

Panel: Will AI Agents Use Crypto? Bridging AI and Decentralized Economies

Speakers:
Jansen Teng, Co-Founder @ Virtuals Protocol
Ahmad Shadid, Founder @ O.XYZ and io.net
Alex Svanevik, Co-Founder and CEO @ Nansen

Moderator:
Melody He, Co-Founder and Partner @ Spartan

Stage: io.net Main Stage
#superai #crypto #aiagents #web3 #ai 

Recorded on 19 June 2025
